ModMetaData.name: More visible pause
ModMetaData.author: aardvark
ModMetaData.description:
Adds colored border when pause is active. Border color, size and transparency can be configured via "Mod Settings" menu.
This mod is depends on Harmony mod for logic wiring. If you have a problem with mod not loading or throwing errors, check if Harmony dependency is satisfied through "Mods" menu.
